paragraphs.text: I’m going to need places to hide.
paragraphs.name: e49d

paragraphs.text: Hi Dylan,
paragraphs.name: 6f5d

paragraphs.text: Just wanted to thank you for putting your insults to me in a bulleted format.
paragraphs.name: dd16

paragraphs.text: Many people curse me out in run-on sentences, so their words not only sting but they’re also hard to read.
paragraphs.name: bc47

paragraphs.text: In a bulleted list like yours, they are much easier for me to scan later on if I…
paragraphs.name: 8fba

virtuals.subtitle: Just wanted to thank you for putting your insults to me in a bulleted format.

content.subtitle: Just wanted to thank you for putting your insults to me in a bulleted format.

bd023eea4d6c.title: The crazy thing about this, is it wouldn’t surprise me one bit.

paragraphs.text: The crazy thing about this, is it wouldn’t surprise me one bit. We already know he gets his news from tabloids. An alien invasion would be on the front of the National Inquirer, and whatever they say is true. He might actually believe it for a while, since the inquirer told him so! LOL!

90192e14816.title: This is your usual (well actually even better than your super usual) over the top reality creation…

f5e1eec10ea4.title: It would be easier on my tired mind if he didn’t leave off whole words.

paragraphs.text: It would be easier on my tired mind if he didn’t leave off whole words. Yours must be bigger. *solemn bow of respect to your massive wit*
paragraphs.name: 9bfc

paragraphs.text: Oh Allan, if only….. and by the way, my birthday is also June 14th. I knew we were kindred spirits. But as you know, we Geminis have dual natures, the schizophrenics of the zodiac. It appears that our asshole in chief has embraced the dark side. Sad.

3aa61a830c70.title: LOL! Maddow showed that the front page was “Trump found the Russian spy!

paragraphs.text: LOL! Maddow showed that the front page was “Trump found the Russian spy! It was all Flynn”. So I would not be surprised if we get a press conference saying everything can end now, the WH figured it out, HA!
paragraphs.name: a5ce

paragraphs.text: You got that right!

fef9dfc89302.title: I have been sharing your satirical prose with my FB friends for about 4(?)

paragraphs.text: I have been sharing your satirical prose with my FB friends for about 4(?) months now Allan. Only my most savvy friends still “get it” and laugh along with me. I really think you are on the satirical sphere of fame within reach of “Doonesbury” and the late George Carlin. This piece is spot-on with regard to the gaming of America by forty-five. Each…
paragraphs.name: d333
